entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
